gen:link.msg:message: v09349_a: [Qualitative trigger for transfer to impairment stage 2] facts must (if reported) be one of the items [No qualitative indicator], [30 days past due], [Watch list], [Forbearance], [Other qualitative trigger or identification of first trigger not possible] --> [C 113.00] [ei470] in {{[eba_ZZ:x409], [eba_ZZ:x410], [eba_ZZ:x411], [eba_ZZ:x412], [eba_ZZ:x413], [eba_ZZ:x640], [eba_ZZ:x641]}} FAILS because {$a} = (xs:QName('eba_ZZ:x409'), xs:QName('eba_ZZ:x410'), xs:QName('eba_ZZ:x411'), xs:QName('eba_ZZ:x412'), xs:QName('eba_ZZ:x413'), xs:QName('eba_ZZ:x640'), xs:QName('eba_ZZ:x641')) is not true
